name: Swinging Blob
description:
A short puzzle platforming game where you control a cute blob that can use a grappling hook to move around but only if he first throws the boulder he's got attached to him. Submission for GMTK Jam 2021Made by sigmaroxt with the help of:
Alabajat and sirjonitaControls:- WASD: Move
- LMB: Launch boulder
- R: Cut the boulder's chain
- RMB: Launch hook (only if you LMB + R first)
- P: Teleport back to the last checkpoint Credits:Code and Art by: Me
Music from:
https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop
Licensed under CC0
